      • loadSecurityContext

        private org.springframework.security.core.context.SecurityContext loadSecurityContext(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Loads information such as roles etc about the user if the user cookie were present. This is a great place to introduce a cache if required to prevent hitting ldap on every call.
        参数:
        request - HttpServletRequest
        返回:
        A SecurityContext
